description: The D-Robotics RDK X3 Development Board, recently showcased by Waveshare, is a versatile platform designed for edge AI applications, offering a powerful combination of processing and inference capabilities. The board comes in a form factor similar to the Raspberry Pi 4B, including a 40-pin GPIO for easy expansion. According to the product page, the board […]
title: RDK X3 Development Board: Raspberry Pi 4B Form Factor with 5TOPs BPU
